sourcesContent:
export function Aside({ chosenAnime }) { const producers = chosenAnime?.producers ?.map((el) => el) ?.map((el) => el?.name) ?.join(" , "); const licensors = chosenAnime?.licensors ?.map((el) => el) ?.map((el) => el?.name) ?.join(" , "); return (
Title: {chosenAnime?.title}
Type: {chosenAnime?.type}
Episodes: {chosenAnime?.episodes}
Status: {chosenAnime?.status}
Aired: {chosenAnime?.aired?.string}
{/*
Premiered: {chosenAnime?.pr}
*/}
Producers: {producers}
Licensors:{licensors}
Studios: {chosenAnime?.studios[0]?.name}
Source: {chosenAnime?.source}
{/*
Theme: {chosenAnime?.themes[0]?.name}
*/} {/*
Demographic: {chosenAnime?.demographics[0]?.name}
*/}
Duration: {chosenAnime?.duration}
Rating: {chosenAnime?.rating}
); }
